input_text:
Job Title: Global Graduate, Aerospace

Location: Ladson, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Aerospace Global Graduate

Location: Ladson, SC

About SKF

SKF has been making the world spin since 1907! 

SKF is an industry-leading manufacturer that's dedicated to a culture of belonging, where our people flourish in an equitable environment that promotes leadership development and career growth.

SKF aims to have net zero greenhouse gas emissions at all our production facilities by 2030.

SKF products keep vehicles rolling, power the machines that put food on your table, and even reach into the cosmos as part of the Mars rover mission. Founded in Sweden in 1907, today SKF is publicly traded on the Nasdaq Stockholm with annual sales in 2020 of approximately $10 billion.

Global Graduate Program Summary

Through the 18-month paid rotational Global Graduate Program, you will get broad experience from various SKF areas and a great opportunity to found a solid international professional network. You will get to know the company through international and cross functional rotations and by working in real projects. Your rotations will be individually designed based on your interests and our business needs. To ensure maximum growth, you will have mentors assigned, supporting you throughout the whole program.

The introduction and program gatherings, in which you will get training within several areas (such as leadership, project management and business knowledge), are spent together with the full Global Graduate group. This means that you, upon completion of the Global Graduate Program, will have a solid platform to leverage a career within SKF.

With This Program We Offer

An 18-month learning experience with permanent employment with SKF.Several individually designed, cross functional rotations with possibilities abroad.The opportunity to participate in, or manage, real projects in a global environment.Vast professional development and growth throughout the whole program.Extensive Project Management & Leadership trainings and experience.A solid professional network – both locally as well as globally.Gatherings with lots of fun together with your Global Graduate colleagues.

Role/Rotation Description

Project management (MRO focus). First project will focus on the MRO business and operations at our repair center in Ladson, SC with the goal of stabilizing and improving performance. Subsequent rotations will also be repair-focused.Location, function and business unit will be based on candidate’s ambition and needs of the business. 

Requirements

Minimum Bachelor´s degree within STEM field or business, in combination with extracurricular activities. Master’s degree preferred. Demonstrated entrepreneurial and innovative mind-set and experience. International and cross culture experiences, preferably from travel and studied/working abroad.0-2 years of working experience post Bachelor’s or Master’s graduation.English working proficiency.Must be a citizen of the United States. 

Successful Attributes And Skills

You actively seek new perspectives and ideas and have effective communication skills. You are resourceful and curious, with ability to efficiently challenge status quo.You collaborate effectively with people from various backgrounds and cultures.You demonstrate willingness and flexibility to move between different functions.Others would most likely describe you as someone who openly share ideas and as the continuous learner who puts emphasis on own and others growth.

What SKF Offers

The opportunity to work in an innovative and well-equipped professional environment that is part of a global company with an excellent reputation. You will join a team of highly motivated colleagues, who will work with you and look forward to seeing you develop your career with SKF.

Reports to: Business and Strategy and PMO Manager

Location: Ladson, SC

Job ID: 19190

SKF provides equal employment [and affirmative action] opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability.

By applying to this job you acknowledge how SKF treats candidate data. Click HERE to review the SKF Data Privacy Consent Statement.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
